org.drip.state.representation

Interface LatentState

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Curve, ExplicitBootCurve
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasisSplineForwardRate, CreditCurve, DerivedFXBasis, DerivedFXForward, DerivedZeroRate, DiscountCurve, DiscountFactorDiscountCurve, ExplicitBootCreditCurve, ExplicitBootDiscountCurve, FlatForwardDiscountCurve, ForwardCurve, ForwardHazardCreditCurve, FXBasisCurve, FXForwardCurve, NonlinearDiscountFactorDiscountCurve, ZeroCurve, ZeroRateDiscountCurve

    public interface LatentState
    LatentState exposes the functionality to manipulate the hidden Variable's Latent State. Specifically it exports functions to: - Retrieve the Array of the LatentStateMetricMeasure - Produce node shifted, parallel shifted, and custom manifest-measure tweaked variants of the Latent State - Produce parallel shifted and custom quantification metric tweaked variants of the Latent State
